email_body:
Dear Mr. Mehta,

This email is to inform you of a billing discrepancy that has been identified within the Proximus system. This issue may impact your responsibilities as a System Administrator. Please review the details provided in the link below for further information and necessary actions.

Sincerely,

Isabelle Dubois
System Analyst
Proximus

Dear Mr. Mehta,

We are writing to you today to address a billing discrepancy that has been detected within the Proximus system. As a System Administrator, this issue may require your attention. Please find the relevant details and instructions in the link provided below.

Regards,

Isabelle Dubois
System Analyst
Proximus

Dear Mr. Mehta,

We have identified a billing discrepancy within the Proximus system that may be relevant to your role as a System Administrator. Please review the information provided in the link below to understand the issue and any required actions.

Best regards,

Isabelle Dubois
